AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted inconsistent information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 14 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 22/01104/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 14 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 22/01104/FUL (Erection of 2no. x new semi-detached dwellings with basements)
